alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 4:47PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Aroostook County through 515 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mapleton, or near Presque Isle, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Presque Isle, Caribou, Fort Fairfield, Limestone, Mapleton, Washburn, Woodland, Chapman, Castle Hill, Perham and Wade. This includes US Highway 1 between Presque Isle and Caribou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
